p:
Moreover, in order to determine cultural significance of each plant species, cultural importance index (CI) [ 22] was calculated as follows:
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ \mathrm{CI}=\sum \limits_{u={u}_1}^{u_{\mathrm{nc}}}.\sum \limits_{i={i}_1}^{i_n}\ {\mathrm{UR}}_{\frac{ui}{N}} $$\end{document}
